name: cyberdogz-alpha
description:
Spaceship Controls
  • Move: [W] [A] [S] [D]
  • Roll: [Q] or [E]
  • Speed Boost: [SHIFT]
  • Ascend: [SPACE BAR]
  • Descend: [CTRL]
  • Primary weapon: Left click
  • Secondary weapon: Right click
  • Aim: Mouse
  • Pause: [ESC]
Notes
  • You need to have Metamask extension installed.
  • To play a battle there must be at least 2 people in the match.
  • You can adjust graphic settings, gameplay settings and sound settings on their menus.

More about Cyberdogz at https://cyberdogz.io/
